lead_paragraph: Recently, I learned about the Silicon Valley entrepreneur and strategy consultant Sramana Mitra's useful Web site for start-ups. Ms. Mitra founded three companies, two of which were acquired, and she is the author of the Entrepreneur Journeys book series. Earlier this year, Ms. Mitra began One Million by One Million (1M/1M), an educational initiative that hopes to help one million entrepreneurs reach $1 million in revenue.
snippet: If your business has yet to be validated by paying customers, you may want to address that issue before seeking Ms. Mitra's counsel.

headline.main: Start-Ups: Can You Handle the Truth?

abstract: If your business has yet to be validated by paying customers, you may want to address that issue before seeking Ms. Mitra's counsel.
